attributes.action: Keep the National anthem for the United Kingdom.." God save our queen "
attributes.additional_details: Why should we change our National anthem after decades.? I think we should be proud to preserve our heritage.!  Please share and sign this with everyone..
attributes.background:
MPs are expected to vote later on the idea of England adopting an official national anthem.
God Save the Queen, the national anthem for the UK as a whole, is currently used for England during most sporting events.
